review: Bought 3 from Staples as gifts under the apparently 'false' pretense that with this device anyone with a Win 8 pc (that has Miracast, an image streaming standard) could mirror their pc monitor. Miracast is a wireless image streaming standard, advertising it in the product marketing gives the mistaken impression that it should work with other Miracast devices in the same manner that a WiFi certified device would be expected to work with other WiFi certified devices. Apparently not. Avoid this device if display mirroring is a useful feature you'd expect to use with a device like this, get a ChromeCast, Roku 3, Roku Stick or Apple TV instead, all have better display mirroring capabilities and cost about the same.
